DOC.brief_summary: The intrauterine device ( IUD ) long-acting , highly effective , reversible contraceptive method may underutilized due fear pain insertion . Although provider frequently prescribe non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) IUD insertion , evidence pain reduction . Women experience high level pain IUD place inside uterus , fear pain could reason woman decide use method .
DOC.brief_title: Glyceryl Trinitrate Versus Lidocaine Cream IUD Insertion
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Women take analgesic anxiolytic 24 hour prior insertion 2 . Women take misoprostol prior IUD insertion 3 .
